revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=T-Com |model=Speedport W723V |revision=Typ A |asin=B004LMZMXS |est_release_date=02/2011 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RTV1645VW |manuf_rev=-E83 |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |pcb_id=RTV1645VW-E83 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6368 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AA160TSA-5G |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43223 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=xDSL Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6302;;1; ,,, 8kHz 100V 1ch SLIC;Microsemi;Le89810BSC;;2; ,,, FXO Chipset 1ch OLAC;Microsemi;Le89010QVC;;2; ,,, ISDN HDLC FIFO Controller;Cologne Chip;XHFC-1SU;;1; |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21.5; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=E8:39:DF |oui_eth=E8:39:DF }} {{TagLine|Telekom Speedport W 723V Typ A DSL Router}} :[https://www.telekom.de/hilfe/geraete-zubehoer/router/speedport-w-723v/bedienungsanleitungen-speedport-w-723v-typ-a?samChecked=true Support page] (DE)
*OEM: [[Askey]] RTV1645VW-E83 ([https://wk.baidu.com/view/413066b265ce05087632134b?pcf=2#32 label]) :([[Huawei]] HG65DT83 VER. E) {{see also|Huawei EchoLife HG655b}}
===Firmware=== Telekom offers a [https://www.telekom.de/hilfe/downloads/firmware-speedport-w723v-typa-v1-01-018.bin firmware file] sized 8,202,592 bytes from April 2017 ready to be dissected. :Firmware contains the strings [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm6368 Broadcom BCM6368] so maybe it used the bcm6368 SoC. [[Broadcom]] BCM6368 is also used by the [[Netgear VVG2000-1]], see also [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/vvg2000-1 OpenWrt wiki]. :And as of ''March 2018'' Netgear still provides some [https://kb.netgear.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/2649 source code] for their device.
===Source code=== According to the [https://www.telekom.de/hilfe/downloads/bedienungsanleitung-speedport-w723v-typa.pdf User's Manual] (DE) page 279, the firmware runs: * Linux 2.6.21.5 * Âµclibc no version specified * busybox 1.9.1 * sipproxd 0.5.10 * ntfs-3g 2010.1.16 * and diverse other GPLed software
The only [http://www.elbeno.com/openwrt/123-netfilter_trigger.patch patch] mentioned is named "OpenWrt" version "2.4.30" to be found at.
==Images== <gallery> File:T-Com Speedport W723V Typ A-front.jpg|front File:T-Com Speedport W723V Typ A-back.jpg|back </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
